Cute and trendy sushi joint that I ain't mad at.  I would usually balk at a fast food sushi joint.  I can be such a sushi snob.  But you know what you're getting when you walk into this place, so your expectations aren't high.  It's really yummy, and I enjoy the hot rolls.  It's probably all types of unhealthy for me, but I dig in.  And it's surprisingly filling.
